GSD.description:
fbdev: smscufx: Fix use-after-free in ufx_ops_open()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 2b0897e33682a332167b7d355eec28693b62119e. For more details please see the references link.
